items.text: slower and fuller on leg stump, tucked towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: picks the length up so early. Swivels back and muscles this pull over square leg. Can't bowl short at his pace
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, SIX runs

items.text: works this into the gap at midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: slapped, but can't pierce the gap. Straight to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: walks across the stumps and squirts this slower delivery to point for a quick single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.preText: Sumon: "Luckily tomorrow is holiday here in Maldives, I can watch full match instead sleep... Come on Tigers." -- Why is it a holiday? I'd die to commentate from a beach shack on a big screen. Alas
items.text: beaten! This is sharp turn that nearly does him
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: solid stride forward as he defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: floated full from wide of the crease, defended back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: once again pushed through quicker on the stumps, blocked.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: backs away, the bowler follows him, but no problem. He still manages to drill this straight down the ground.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.text: clean swing, clears wide long-on. Got to the pitch and swung through. There's no way that was landing short.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, SIX runs

items.preText: struck on the pad, and he's plumb. Don't bother reviewing.....Oh, wait. Lewis has.
items.text: length ball that angles in from around the stumps and straightens a touch to beat Lewis' inside edge. The stride wasn't too much forward, so the ball didn't have much to travel. Hit on the knee roll. Ball tracking rightly shows it crashing into middle and leg. West Indies lose their review. Poor decision to take one.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, OUT

dismissal.text: E Lewis lbw b Mashrafe Mortaza 12 (18b 1x4 1x6) SR: 66.66

items.preText: Shai Hope is in at No. 3
items.text: slaps this short ball straight to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: goes right back into the crease and turns this length ball into the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: much fuller, just outside off, left alone.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.preText: Karar: "He took the review may be because he didn't want to do the same mistake twice. In the last match he should have."
items.text: once again floated full, just outside off, left alone.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: thick outside edge to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tucks this to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: flicked to square leg again, was off balance as he played this.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: turns this to midwicket where there's a diving stop by Rubel
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: skids one in, defended back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: squeezes this full delivery back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: Sajib: "Last match it was Hope who should have taken the review, not Lewis."
items.text: shortish and spinning in, turned to square leg.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: Rajiv: "WI need to make better use of their reviews. Seems they waste them more times than not." -- Most of it stems from either the non-striker being unsure. Most batsmen want to go up on an impulse. Upon the non-striker to ensure they're prudent
items.text: driven firmly, but straight to cover point.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: tucks this to the vacant midwicket region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run
